html.body: This process models the agent's automatic idle behavior depending on its participant role and the progress status of the curren turn's pipeline.
This process models the agent's deliberative dialog behavior and the different phases of a turn run while the agent is in the listener role.
While switching to the listener role, the agent has to abort all active behaviors and utterances as soon as possible.
This process models a pipeline runthrough in a single turn with the different phases of a turn. Here we use the initial meta data for each turn.
We receive the user's speech input and from that moment on we are planning the response.
ToDo. Here we need to post an abort signal to the avatar service in order to abort the avatar's speech and animations.
The agent starts in the speaker role and switches immediately to the listener role as soon as the user starts speaking.
ToDo: Enrich the speaker role with automatic idle behaviors depending on the current status.
